website_summaries.verdict: With 400 grams of powder, this is a great value compared to many competitors.
pros: For a low price, you get 100% creatine powder with 5 grams of micronized creatine monohydrate per serving in an unflavored powder
Many customers noticed a decrease in muscle soreness during workouts using this powder
cons: Some customers experienced gas and bloating after using this powder

customer_reviews.title: Half full, Full price!
customer_reviews.text: The one star is not for the effectiveness, but rather the amount received. Opened to find barely half full! Claims to be 14.11 oz. Weighed it and even with the container barely weighed over 9 ounces! I love mustletech products but this is very disappointing. Won't order again.
customer_reviews.author: dan sjoquist

customer_reviews.title: Looking for that pump look all day?  This is the stuff.
customer_reviews.text: This stuff has made a massive difference in my physique. I'd been strength training for about 6 months before I started taking this and seeing average results. This stuff has made my muscles really pop over the last 30 days of use. Suddenly people are asking about what I'm doing to look so good. At 43 years old, that makes me happy! It also seems to help me not be as sore after my workout, which helps me train harder the next time. Also, this stuff is so much easier to take than the old stuff 10 years ago. One little scoop per day is easy and fast.
customer_reviews.author: B. Keller

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I’ve never experienced worse stomach issues than I have with this creatine. I’ve always taken 100% creapure and decided to take a chance on this based on the positive reviews. I wish I never spent my money on this product. I’ve noticed no change in energy levels or gym advantages like I had with creapure creatine brands. Unfortunately I bought two tubs of this and will have to throw it out or give it away because I can’t stomach it. Back to ON.
customer_reviews.author: Seth R

customer_reviews.title: Definite Gains!
customer_reviews.text: This product is less than $8; high quality; 80 servings(comes w/scoop); made from reputable company. What's not to like?! I noticed after a week of consuming this product I was increasing weights on all my exercises. I would highly recommend to anyone looking to increase their strength and next day recovery. I felt less tired and had more day to day energy. My stack: Animal Fury pre-workout, Animal Pak multivitamin, Animal Whey(strawberry)w/Muscle Tech Creatine, Mutant Mass Gainer(Triple Chocolate), and Dr. Tobias Omega Fish Oil. Cheers!
customer_reviews.author: grand-poobah

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic and simple
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic and simple. When I started taking creatine, it was with kre-alkalyn and was seeing pretty well no results and was getting really bad headaches on top of that, and yes that is with drinking crazy amounts of water. Then I tried creatine blends, BPI sports best creatine, which tasted gross, loaded with sweeteners, and once again, didn't work probably because the creatine profile was just wrong. Then I decided to follow conventional wisdom and simplify things, just use good old fashioned micronized creatine monohydrate. The difference has been amazing. Gains, strength, recovery speed, no headaches, never had a bloating problem. Just all around happy with this stuff.
customer_reviews.author: David Brown

customer_reviews.title: Works at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: I mix this into my preworkout because I like to control how much I intake. It’s important to see how much works best for your workouts, especially if you take it before like I do. I can definitely feel the difference when I take it. Not only does it give me some more pump during my sets, I can also push out a bit more weight when I take it. If I take too much, it reduces my workout time as my muscles start to get too tight to function. That being said, I know this stuff works because of all this. It’s a quality product, very affordable, mixes well, and works great!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: A middle of the road Creatine.
customer_reviews.text: This is a decent creatine, but definitely not the best. I do like that you take so much less of it compared to others, but the underlying reason to take creatine is to get stronger, and it is pretty good at helping this process, but not great.
customer_reviews.author: Stevae

customer_reviews.title: Good Price
customer_reviews.text: This is what I use, good price, disolves perfect. I don't know a difference, but at 51--maybe just maintaining is good enough. Muscle size is good, just hard for me to gain strength (Im not weak, but not super strong either). I think it may be a Placebo, creatine seems to work better for me when in a pre workout mix, which I have not been using. But then who knows if the creatine is doing it, or just the PW Mix. I don't take creatine with sugar carbs, because im diabetic---maybe doing that would help. I like it thouugh and will keep buying it a few more times at least.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher H.

customer_reviews.title: Good Ol' Creatine
customer_reviews.text: This creatine is what it says it is. The only problem is finding the scoop at first but cmon we all know we couldnt find a scoop at one point or another. It gives Increase of muscle mass due to the water being brought to them along with some real gainz all because of creatine. Its been proven to be the most safe sports supplement on the market and it will not dissapoint. You do have to put in the work also if you really expect this product to do its magic. Get out there and Lift Big!
customer_reviews.author: KoolKris

customer_reviews.title: Great creatine. Great energy and power in the gym
customer_reviews.text: Great creatine. Great energy and power in the gym. However, do look at some of the side effects of creatine, specifically accelerated hair loss. A month after starting creatine I noticed a receding hair line. I stopped and it hasn't grown back. It's possible that it started before creatine, but that is one of the possible side effects. otherwise, I'd take it every day since it increased my performance so I can push myself and the gym without getting fatigued. I noticed increased testosterone. More physical energy. The possible side effect is just a huge irony. Unless you find a girl who likes balding muscle guys more than hairful scrawny guys.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work for me
customer_reviews.text: I did the loading phase and started using it as described. I work out 5 days a week for around 2 hours which I use my Bowflex revolution too. I haven't felt any different or noticed any change to my muscles or lost any fat or gained muscle. All I've done is get a gassy stomach , sickness and continuous trips to the bathroom. Personally it isn't working for me si I'm giving it a one star based on experience
customer_reviews.author: Tracey Mahoney

customer_reviews.title: Need that extra kick? Order this!
customer_reviews.text: Wow, just wow. This stuff is exactly what I was looking for! I've noticed that extra "reserve" of strength when doing one of Jeff Nippard's workouts. I put this together with a BCAA blend of 3:1:2 before, during and after my workouts. I went from benching 155 max to repping 205 in a matter of 3 months. I haven't lifted since high school but now this stuff has brought back the strength I had back then. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: John Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Be very carefully! Destroyed my THS level!
customer_reviews.text: This product almost killed me! After taking 5 mg daily it destroyed my THS level, from normal point to 0,01! I visited my doctor and Was treating around 5 months for this issue. Be very carefully please! I was thinking it’s not problem to take this supplement but...
customer_reviews.author: Zura

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff great product...
customer_reviews.text: This taste. Well it’s tasteles and that’s all that matters. It doesn't mix very well but i usually mix it with my pre workout. Just shake the crap out of it and it will mix. I gained about 4lb of muscle so far and thats with following the recommend serving on the label. I also notice a bit more strength on my lifts. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Davis Banda

customer_reviews.title: PLECEBO! 😔
customer_reviews.text: My doctor provides me with Creatine blood test results every 3-5 months, and since I've been taking this brand of creatine, my levels went from 0.84 to 0.94mg/dL which is very minimal given its hype! I've also been taking Muscletech Mass Tech, which has 10g of creatine in it too! Therefore, my daily intke is around 15mg of creatine per day with very low results! Scientifically proven - it's a plecebo for the most part. I have gained mass but that can be due to a few other factors. I've had much better results with other brands!
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Rikk

customer_reviews.title: Decent, noticeable but minor benefits
customer_reviews.text: I lift / use weights 3 times a week, not really trying to go for heavy gains. But I do feel this works, it's not a huge difference to me. It lasts for me a long time (I take the minimum amount on the label). Would continue using. I have no complaints. No real flavor, easy to digest etc.
customer_reviews.author: hi

customer_reviews.title: ESSENTIAL SUPPLEMENT
customer_reviews.text: Creatine is one of those things that is vital for everyone who even thinks about picking up weights. As such there are so many fancy variations out there marketed to try to trick you into buying. DONT BE FOOLED. This supplement should be taken in a very pure form that ends up being the cheapest variant. Very happy with price and brand.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Le

customer_reviews.title: Great results and mixes amazing
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for about three years and it has become a staple in my supliments. It has helped me put on a good amount of lean mass resulting in considerable strength gains. Having a healthy diet and solid training program is also important to maximize results. Also drink as much water as you can. Overall love the product, mix ability and results. At this price point you can’t beat it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality, Easy Mixing Creatine
customer_reviews.text: Great product, mixes well w/out clumping. I mix this into my protein green smoothies & my BCAAs drink for my MTB rides. I use a bullet mixer for my protein smoothies but just add it direct to my Polar bottle for my rides. I just shake the bottle by hand & the MuscleTech Platinum Creatine Monohydrate Powder mixes thoroughly w/out clumping. This creatine does not alter the taste of my drinks. I am completely happy w/this product. If your looking for a clean mixing creatine, pick this up.
customer_reviews.author: Spike

customer_reviews.title: Hair Loss
customer_reviews.text: Starting taking this product about 6 months ago. 3 months in I began to experience increased shedding on my head. I immediately discontinued use but I have yet to see a stop in hair loss. I'm a bit bummed out by this but I'm aware of the fact that creatine raises DHT levels which does lead to hair loss.
customer_reviews.author: Iman Solemonpoor

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good
customer_reviews.text: The main concern I had before buying was some crazy side-effect. I read some of these reviews complaining about side effects, but I'm pretty sure these people are hurting themselves working out (cuz they probably haven't worked out in years and are grossly overweight). Probably has nothing to do with this creatine. I've had zero problems. Try it.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: I did see some results with this creatine, but ...
customer_reviews.text: I did see some results with this creatine, but do not have any other experiences to reference it to. However, I did have a lot of headaches with this despite drinking a lot of water each day. I cut the dose in half, but continued to have headaches. So, I stopped using it. I do see a difference in the lack of water retention or muscle, but also notice fewer headaches. Just something to consider.
customer_reviews.author: Bradyn E Roddy

customer_reviews.title: I hope it works for you but I didn’t gain any weight muscle wise, and it hurts my stomach
customer_reviews.text: I took this for 3 months, didn’t gain a single pound, and much more often than not it gave me a stomach ache.The little scoop is buried deep in the powder; not fun to dig for it with a tea spoon. It mostly dissolves well, and I gave the flavor a high mark because as advertised it actually has no flavor. This is strictly individual; I could be one of those unlucky people that does not respond to creatine but to my personal experience this product is pure garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Made me sick
customer_reviews.text: I’ve never taken creatine before until I purchased this product. I consumed the recommended dose on Monday and Tuesday, and was very sick on Wednesday (muscle aches, running a fever, and a massive headache to boot). For the record, I’m a healthy person and was drinking plenty of water. Most studies involving creatine advise that it’s generally very effective and safe, however, that did not turn out for me personally. I will never take any kind of supplemental creatine ever again.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Caused horrible kidney pain
customer_reviews.text: After reading the reviews and haven taken creatine for years, I decided to give this stuff a try. I had seen in some reviews people experiencing kidney pain caused by this product, but chose to ignore it and am paying the price. I took this product for roughly a week, taking 10gs a day, 5g in the morning and 5g before bed. within 3 days I started experiencing kidney pain on my right side and stopped taking the product. It has since been 5 days and I am STILL experiencing pain. Going to the Drs. to get this figured out. Stay away from this product.
customer_reviews.author: David F.

customer_reviews.title: Everyone has commented on how big I'm beginning to look.
customer_reviews.text: Even when mixed into plain water, it doesn't have an offensive taste. Small scoops are the equivalent to large servings, so not much is needed. I've had the same tub for over three months, and not even halfway finished yet. I am happy and excited with the results I've seen so far. In combination with my protein regimen and necessary caloric surplus, I've gained approximately fifteen pounds in just over five months. Mostly muscle. Both family and friends have commended me on my gains, as I've been twig skinny for the majority of my life. Thankful for this supplement and the fantastic results it's provided thus far.
customer_reviews.author: JessX

customer_reviews.title: Great Value for a Lot of Servings
customer_reviews.text: Flavor: Simple--there is none. Quality: Basically, all creatine products are the same. Some promise a variety of different benefits, but almost all of those are marketing ploys to pay a premium for "Micronized Creatine HCL". It is not a high or low quality product because, in my opinion, they are all the same. Experience: It does as promised, expect to put on several pounds in the first couple of weeks of use (almost entirely water weight). I do feel my compound lifts increase over time when I'm on the supplement. It does take a while to kick in so do not expect results in the first couple of days. Rating: 10/10
customer_reviews.author: Griffin Gallant

customer_reviews.title: Great product with a temporary side effect
customer_reviews.text: Great product with accurate dosing. The micro scoop is great and it is completely flavorless which makes it easy to mix into your preworkout. BUT, I was having serious stomach issues the first couple of days of taking this product. It almost felt like someone was holding a blowtorch on my stomach. After about 3 days, I no longer have that feeling
customer_reviews.author: The Primetime Kid

customer_reviews.title: Follow Instructions
customer_reviews.text: So I read a lot of horror stories in reviews and honestly I want sure about making the jump to creatine. I did it anyway and I'm glad a did, day 1 was horrible since I struggled with the large amount of water I needed to drink (half your bodyweight in ounces i.e. 200lbs people would drink 100 ounces) but after I got used to staying that hydrated and kept up on it I've had no issues and my recovery time after working out had declined dramatically. If you take it seriously and research how your body type/size will react to it then you should be able to avoid all the pain being described.
customer_reviews.author: Kudiy

customer_reviews.title: I use this product to help maintain my muscle tone ...
customer_reviews.text: I use this product to help maintain my muscle tone and it seems to be working very well. Before I started using this product I was having problems keeping up with my daily workout. And I was experiencing an assortment of aches and pains, plus cramps all over my body. At 60 plus years old I find this working very well for me..
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Brophy ..

customer_reviews.title: Great Results
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best non-flavored creatine’s I have used. It mixes well with anything and leaves no aftertaste at all if mixing with just water. Gives a good sustained pump after a good workout and does help with long range muscle growth. Another great Muscletech product and will continue to use on a daily basis.
customer_reviews.author: James Girardot

customer_reviews.title: MuscleTech is a go to brand in the supplement industry for sure!
customer_reviews.text: This creatine mixes very easily with almost no residue in my glass of orange juice with water mixed. It is a very nice clean looking powder and no clumps in the tub it came in. As for performance, I have now started using it this week but I know MuscleTech does not disappoint. My workouts feel stronger right now but I also eat well enough and use a pre workout. I know this combination of food and supplement once done right is a plus to any workout. Creatine Monohydrate I have heard is well researched, tried and tested.
customer_reviews.author: Dimitri Illya Jeet

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: It works. haven't had any weight gain (good) feel stronger (better) muscles all around feel extra solid (this should be banned) kidding.. try it its cheap GH. I did 10g daily for week or two 5g before workout and 5g after workout . Now just 5g daily without fail
customer_reviews.author: JRD

customer_reviews.title: Great Basic Creatine
customer_reviews.text: This is a basic no-frills monohydrate creatine power that I add to my weight gainer shakes. Great quality, mix-ability, absorb-ability and price. Infuses the muscles for greater size and increased strength. Aids in getting muscles pumped up in the gym and adding mass.
customer_reviews.author: The Plowman

customer_reviews.title: This stuff works fast
customer_reviews.text: I am pleased with the results. I saw a very quick increase in my lifting. Since it is flavorless I mix it with my protein and slug it down. If you just mix it in water, it’s hard to drink because it can be a little chalky. Overall I’m pleased with it and it does exactly what I was hoping for and expecting.
customer_reviews.author: Jake Alanis

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend. I do not work out a ton. But I am getting older and perhaps my creatine output is not as it once was. So I use this as a supplement with apple juice and I feel better and stronger while on it. Drink lots of water, as with any creatine it can be hard on Kidneys but perfectly safe as long as you drink water. May cause crapping if you do not drink enough water.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This product works great saw more intense muscle gains in one month than ...
customer_reviews.text: This product works great saw more intense muscle gains in one month than i ever did after one month without this product. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: True_True2100

customer_reviews.title: Simple product but great! Product is as titled
customer_reviews.text: Simple product but great! Product is as titled, 100% creatine. There is no flavor so I would mix this with my protein or any flavored drink. It would mix right away without any clumping, so you can mix it in with a spoon easily. I would also put this into my preworkout if it didn't have creatine in it. I had seen an increase on muscle mass because I am able to push slightly harder at the gym.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler S.

customer_reviews.title: Recommend.
customer_reviews.text: I've been off creatine for about 8 years before going back. I chose this creatine mainly based off positive reviews, and the product has not disappointed. I've noticed gains after only 1.5 weeks. Definitely going to replenish once I am out, which will be in about 3 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Erik Antonio

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. Stayed on split exercise routine and surpasses size and strength barriers I could not have without it. Same as other creatine results for me but the price was right. Zero flavor so I just add to protein shake at breakfast and get in with the day. Remember to drink lots of water using creatine.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy product can make you sick.
customer_reviews.text: Used for a week and saw immediate difference in strength. Problem was, I had a bad reaction and for the following week intense stomach pain and about 4 straight days of having to stay close to the bathroom. Not to be gross but every half hour to hour I was on the can. I followed the instructions to the letter and still this happened. I ended up throwing it out and I’ll never use again.
customer_reviews.author: Mando

customer_reviews.title: taste wasn't that appealing
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this because recently tried whey protein with creatine included and noticed results over and above 4 years of steady whey. However I get kind of a weird feeling (on taste) when taking this product by itself-because I have had good results from this I will try a different brand and hopefully will be more acceptable to my system
customer_reviews.author: Dibash Chimoriya

customer_reviews.title: A good quality item
customer_reviews.text: This creatine is a good quality item on the market, for the amount of money you pay this does the work . As long as you keep drinking a lot of water it will do it works. The combination goas creatine, glutamine, and protein. This combination will get you where you want to get to .
customer_reviews.author: drivas909

customer_reviews.title: I really like how easily it dissolves
customer_reviews.text: I think I found my new go to creatine. This product goes with any diet. I really like how easily it dissolves. I think the best thing about this product is that it is just what you need without all the fillers and unneeded sugars. This is a great product for anyone watching their carb and calorie count.
customer_reviews.author: Naya169

customer_reviews.title: Taste is fine and it dissolves well
customer_reviews.text: Taste is fine and it dissolves well. I've been taking it the last few weeks and I think it's absolutely helped my recovery and progress. Never been bigger or stronger. Of course it takes good diet and a lot of hard work, but the science is clear this stuff is universally proven to be awesome and I'm definitely seeing those benefits.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great price for Creatine!
customer_reviews.text: I add it to water and don't taste it at all. Kind of subjective but I think creatine makes a big difference. Stay consistent with your lifting and consumption and you will see results. That being said,, this is a long term supplement- you probably won't see any results within a few weeks of starting it. Also keep in mind if you have any blood tests, you might fail because of high creatinine levels (waste product of creatine).
customer_reviews.author: Zach

customer_reviews.title: Best product I’ve used for creatine, hands down.
customer_reviews.text: I loaded the first week, and then took the recommended amount after that. It definitely helps kickstart the muscle growth even if a lot of it is water weight. I enjoyed the taste, and it didn’t leave that grainy taste in my mouth like other products do. It dissolves easily and tastes great. Mix it with your protein powder and make a shake.
customer_reviews.author: Cadigan

customer_reviews.title: Dissolves easily with no flavor
customer_reviews.text: I've never found much difference between any creatine. I rate this one a five based on the fact that it dissolves easily and has no flavor (good or bad). I can mix it in yogurt or a protein shake and it doesn't affect the flavor.
customer_reviews.author: StephenC

customer_reviews.title: Terrible side effects
customer_reviews.text: I've taken a lot of creatine in my day but this stuff gives me the worst stomach problems i've ever experienced please use caution if you are thinking about trying this product. extreme diarrhea im talking like every 15 mins i have to run to the toilet plus terrible gas and not knowing if liquid or air will come out its not a good mixture plus my stomach overall was always upset when using this product. I stopped using this creatine product and within a couple days i was back to normal. Not against creatine but just don't order this brand there is a lot of other brands out there. You've been warned haha
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: . This product is very good value and priced fairly. I'll definitely buy it again.
customer_reviews.text: The carrier put package by my door. The nice part about that was that they Took A Picture of product by the door and sent it with Delivery Notice. I REALLY like that!
customer_reviews.author: Clifford

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described. Flavorless creatine in its purest form. There is somewhat of a dry kind of aftertaste but it doesn't really bother me. Keep in mind creatine doesn't mix very well so you will have to constantly mix it and drink it. Definitely worth the money as creatine taken regularly adds up!
customer_reviews.author: KJ

customer_reviews.title: Strange, very unpleasant side effects
customer_reviews.text: I tried this brand as a cheaper replacement for creapure. After three days I threw it away and ordered my old stuff. There is something in this product that my body had a serious reaction to - mental fog and headache, sleeplessness, hypertension. It started right away and stopped immediately after I stopped taking it. I would very much like to see a lab analysis of what impurities or foreign substances are in this powder.
customer_reviews.author: Martin H

customer_reviews.title: Creatine is as creatine does
customer_reviews.text: It does what you think it does and it does it well. This is great quality creatine and it helps a lot with recovery time and building strength and muscle. While you do retain some water because thats kinda what creatine does, it helps so much and gives you great results. I've been losing weight and am lifting more than when I started.
customer_reviews.author: Evilzombie

customer_reviews.title: Kidney problems?
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing, been on the loading phase and feeling fine. Feel amazing at the gym and already see a pump, don’t listen to the guys who say they have kidney problems they don’t know what they’re talking about make sure you drink LOTS of water to help the creative absorb. Do your research before taking this stuff it’s no joke. Make sure to spread your portions throughout the day on loading phase, don’t take it all at once.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Odria

customer_reviews.title: Fast recovery
customer_reviews.text: I bought this supplement to improve my perfomance in the gym and it is the first time that I used this type of supplement. I was surprised that it is tasteless, but the loading phase was very bad for me, I had stomachache for like 3 days because of this. But in the maintenance phase the pain went away and I liked that I managed to lift more weith and recover faster from my training. I would continue use it when the gym reopens.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Rivero

customer_reviews.title: This is going to last for a decade
customer_reviews.text: Unlike pre workout and mid workout, this one has no good taste - actually tastes weird. I pushed myself to try it after every workout but feels punishing myself. I bought this long time ago and never could finish it. Packaging is good, flavor is no good.
customer_reviews.author: Malik Moonzajer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing results
customer_reviews.text: When I started using this stuff, I noticed incredible gains. I had already tried bulking with protein only, which was good but my progress was very slow. Once I got back into weightlifting, I decided to try combining my protein with creatine, so I bought this. The results were incredible, I saw the progress within two weeks. After a couple of months of consistent working out and supplementing with this, I gained like 15 pounds and looked and felt like a new person. Definitely worth it, and this supply lasts quite a while. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Bryce

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product..have been taking this product since couple of months and notice incredible increase in strength & stamina especially in gym during weight lifting. Muscle size is getting better without any bloat in a stomach and face.
customer_reviews.author: Vikas Sharma

customer_reviews.title: As advertised but not full container
customer_reviews.text: Overall the powder was as stated and didn’t have any flavor which I like. One downside is the when you reach the bottom of the glass you get a lot of powder but it’s pretty much the same for every protein powder. The scoop is hard to use and I recurved about 3/4 full container. I haven’t seen as much gain as I expected from this product but then again it has only been a month. Would recommend a great value
customer_reviews.author: Colton A.

customer_reviews.title: Mixes well, Good value
customer_reviews.text: I'm very satisfied with this creatine. It mixes well into almost any beverage without clumping or residue left in the bottom of the cup. It gives no taste to whatever you add it to. Very good price per oz as well. I'll order again.
customer_reviews.author: Vegas Dave

customer_reviews.title: Great product, could improve packaging.
customer_reviews.text: Truly tasteless, which I was glad for. Only thing I dislike is that the label falls straight off.
customer_reviews.author: Shaquanna

customer_reviews.title: Crunchy Drinks and Cheap Gains
customer_reviews.text: Without a change in net calories, I gained about 5lbs, which is typical and expected. My batch has never mixed "well," but that honestly is the least of my concern given its purpose. Meets expectations given the price. Drink water. More than you expect. Crush every bottle in sight. 3/5 - Satisfied with the product. Not sold on the brand. Go hard. Ball out.
customer_reviews.author: Johnson

customer_reviews.title: just okay, six stars creatine monohydrate was better.
customer_reviews.text: It struck me as a good value, given the price and number of servings, but this really doesn't dissolve as well as six stars creatine, and it's of the same variety, 5 stars on flavor since it has none, by design, but It tends to have a few small clumps and leave a lot against the wall of the shaker bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Cody T. May

customer_reviews.title: Better to Buy Creatine Made in USA or Germany
customer_reviews.text: Simply put, you can spend $1-2 more and get the same amount of creatine from an American or German source. If I put it in my body, I'm not buying it if it's made in China. After using two tubs of this and realizing it is not high quality stuff and made in China, I switched to BPI Sports. It's made in the USA. 300 grams for $7.99. Way better.
customer_reviews.author: LM

customer_reviews.title: Don't notice much of a difference, but I'm not ...
customer_reviews.text: Don't notice much of a difference, but I'm not really lifting weights either. I think you are definitely supposed to lift weights with this ;)
customer_reviews.author: Ryan O'Loughlin

customer_reviews.title: Get ready to gain weight where you least expect it!
customer_reviews.text: The only place I gained weight was the muffin top area, I eat extremely healthy and work out 2 to 3 hours a day. I stopped using the product and bulge went away.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Reese

customer_reviews.title: Bad reaction got sick and muscles stopped working
customer_reviews.text: I am very serious! Be very careful of this stuff! If you try it go with small doses to start. I wrote in they told me to do it 5 times the first day! I am so glad I did not believe it or listen. I did 3 half power or dose shakes in the day and the next day I thought I was going to die!!!! Every muscle was sore including my heart!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! I could not lift anything! I did nothing special nor did I do any extra exercises. My advice is STAY AWAY!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: C Collins

customer_reviews.title: Best bargain.
customer_reviews.text: Just really can't beat the price. Large quantity for the amount paid.
customer_reviews.author: Shanne 41

customer_reviews.title: This is creatine and its most basic form at a ...
customer_reviews.text: This is creatine and its most basic form at a decent price. I think MuscleTech should provide some kind of moisture absorbing packet inside the container. The creatine will absorb moisture from the air and start to clump up. This doesn't ruin the effectiveness of the creatine but it definitely makes it a nuisance when trying to scoop it
customer_reviews.author: D8210

customer_reviews.title: feels I am getting a result as described
customer_reviews.text: I have no issues with the product unlike some others said they had experienced diarrhea or had to go to ER due to the overdose in the beginning. It's good that I feel I do lift more weight little by little, not sure it's because of the product but I believe so. It says there's no flavor, but I taste bitter or something like a medicine (yes this is medicine tho). I do not like this taste.
customer_reviews.author: Seongho

customer_reviews.title: Elevates blood pressure
customer_reviews.text: I started to make gains on this but had to stop taking it because my blood pressure went up so high. This is a known side effect of creatine. So be careful and monitor your BP should you decide to take it.
customer_reviews.author: Loren W. Christensen

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Creatine
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this creatine on and off cycles for a little over two years and have nothing but great things to say about it. I always put on about 10-15 pounds while on a cycle of this (keep in mind this is with intense training 7 days a week). I love using a flavorless creatine, because it can be consumed in pretty much anything, which definitely cuts down on prep time. For serious lifters, this is a supplement I'd highly recommend adding to your stack or between stack cycles. I will definitely continue using.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: have reduced dosage from recommended amounts to see what effects this might had
customer_reviews.text: This product is inexpensive, in does seem to add in Lean Muscle. by problem is that it also seemed to cause dry scales to form behind ears and on my eyelids, have reduced dosage from recommended amounts to see what effects this might had, think I will try another product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Seeing gains, not even working out that hard
customer_reviews.text: Seeing gains, and I'm lifting weights for maybe 20 minutes a week and walking for 5 days a week. Not magic powder by any means, and every body will work differently, but I'm happy with the results.
customer_reviews.author: AA

customer_reviews.title: The real, right stuff
customer_reviews.text: Still the single best and most effective supplement out there. This is a high quality creatine from a consistently reliable company. Priced competitively as well. No need to look elsewhere. Just buy this one.
customer_reviews.author: Lyle M. Back

customer_reviews.title: plastic was in powder
customer_reviews.text: when i opened the container as i went to take a scoop out i thought i seen a piece of glass. It turns out it was plastic but I was grossed out.
customer_reviews.author: WILL DEZARN

customer_reviews.title: It's cheap but lacks results
customer_reviews.text: It's been over 2 months. I haven't seen a difference in body physique or strength as they advertise. My body and workouts have improved but I highly doubt it's from this product. I kept a tight record from the day of purchase and my workout routine. It's hard to say or study if it was the product or my lack of pushing myself 😂. Ive had better gains with other creatine manufacturer. Everyone's body reacts differently, trial and error.
customer_reviews.author: Warri0r

customer_reviews.title: Works but does not sit well
customer_reviews.text: I definitely noticed a difference in my physique. I retained more water and seemed to have fuller muscles. Downside is my GI tract was not able to handle it well. Loading or not, I was unable to get by rectally unscathed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I believe this was a great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I have been able to work full time and work out and still not feel beat like I usually do with extra aches and pains and helps me make sure I’m drinking enough water which is a plus as well I’m enjoying it
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Innafective
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn't buy this again. I dont know if this was even the real product or not, bought in quarantine when everything else is closed. Threw it out because who know what kind of powder it is.
customer_reviews.author: Mary B

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: I read some reviews and after 10g a day for 2 weeks, I can tell a difference in the gym. The container is big and about half full. No taste I mix it with grape juice. 5g before and 5g after.
customer_reviews.author: Corey S. Major

customer_reviews.title: READ LABEL
customer_reviews.text: ALLERGY WARNING: Processed in a facility that processes MILK, EGG, SOY, FISH and SHELLFISH ingredients. I just read the label. I’m highly allergic to SHELLFISH. Can’t take that risk, Ugh!
customer_reviews.author: emar

customer_reviews.title: so far so good !!
customer_reviews.text: unflavored so you can mixed with what ever juice or drink you have available ! for the first couple of days stay close to the bathroom jajajajajaj but great stuff over all !
customer_reviews.author: Luis Miguel Peña Mainieri

customer_reviews.title: No complaints
customer_reviews.text: Not much to say. It’s flavorless and I don’t have any trouble mixing it into my protein drinks. I don’t know that I’ve been taking this long enough to notice a difference.
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: Bugs inside
customer_reviews.text: It’s a good creatine but I literally found small bugs in it. I opened the tin on the inside of the cap and they’re we’re little ant-looking bugs in the inside. Absolutely unacceptable.
customer_reviews.author: Joe S.

customer_reviews.title: Need at least 2 scoop a day to feel changes
customer_reviews.text: I felt de difference when I started taking two Scoops a day (one in the mornings Before the breakfast, and the other one after training). nice product, good lab, is a basic supplement. It does not works in the first day, you have to take it continuously if you wanna feel the effect, every day. No training days I only take one scoop. That is how it works for me.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge Villa

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This creatine product by MuscleTech is probably the best creatine on Amazon. Also what the price it is not too expensive you get 80 servings 5 grams per serving which is on believable. I just ordered my second one and will probably continue using arm because of the results I am getting from it
customer_reviews.author: Mario

customer_reviews.title: Good Creatine
customer_reviews.text: Gave 5 stars to flavor even though its flavorless but it states that so why dock it on the review? The best creatine I've bought, gets me through a workout and kicking a shovel or using a jackhammer all day long at work.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Very Good
customer_reviews.text: The packaging could use work, the moving label makes it difficult to open sometimes. When its mixed with just water it's like drinking mineral water so very easy to drink. If you don't drink it right away it will clump in drinks slightly but not uncomfortably.
customer_reviews.author: Gage

customer_reviews.title: Gotta work
customer_reviews.text: Quite honestly, it’s a pretty basic formula that is consistent across most brands. But, I chose this one because of other reviews from websites and such. If you chose this one you will be good if you know what you’re doing. Ultimately the product will only work if you do the work.
customer_reviews.author: D3cipher

customer_reviews.title: Bad product! Don’t buy!
customer_reviews.text: Would not recommend this product at all. The directions on the bottle tells you to take like 4 scoops for the first few days which should have been a warning to me. Not everyone’s body can handle that much creatine and it messed me up pretty bad. Avoid this product!!
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Questionable Quality Controls
customer_reviews.text: I'm concerned about the quality control of this product. The first jar I received provided very noticable improvements in athletic energy and countered the lactic acid burn. The second jar doesn't seem to be working and is different. It cakes together as if it wasn't dry before packaging. It won't release from the scoop without tapping several times. That and the decreased performance cause me question the product's quality controls.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Monohydrate Powder....
customer_reviews.text: ...my guy does not want this in his Creatine. Our regular supplement was on backorder everywhere and I ventured into uncharted territory. We sent it back
customer_reviews.author: rexy donner

customer_reviews.title: No flavor, dissolves instantly
customer_reviews.text: It's hard to find supplements that dissolve perfectly. This does the trick! No flavor which makes it perfect to mix with my flavored workout supplements.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Hinson

customer_reviews.title: Straight in the Trash
customer_reviews.text: Good creatine has no flavor. This one has a distinct, powerful chemical taste. The kind that immediately tells you it doesn’t belong in your body. Thought I’d take a chance on a cheaper creatine, but I’m sticking with Dymatize and MTS, which are both very affordable anyway. Fortunately amazon was great about returning it.
customer_reviews.author: BillWeaver

customer_reviews.title: I got an upset stomach for the first few days but looks like it's getting better now
customer_reviews.text: It's really tasteless - just make sure you let it dissolve completely. I got an upset stomach for the first few days but looks like it's getting better now. I'll let you know in 2-3 year what the results are :) It's easier to drink that some of the other brands so I'm happy with this.
customer_reviews.author: Cristian V.

customer_reviews.title: Great for a clean bulk
customer_reviews.text: I have recently started using this creatine on my first official clean bulk (after having been lifting for a year now) and am already seeing tangible results from it. I highly recommend if you are looking for something to make your muscles look fuller. Mine already do after only using it for a month. Many people complain of water retention, but I don't see much retention from this product, which is a huge positive.
customer_reviews.author: Prashant Godishala

customer_reviews.title: Quality Creatine
customer_reviews.text: Flavor less. It mixes with anything and I took after two weeks off of working out and def felt a little more endurance in the gym. Was able to finish a full hour workout after weeks off.
customer_reviews.author: FittyP.

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Epic!! NOTICEABLY decreased recovery times, crazy gains in 5 weeks and lost fat. Lifetime user now after having been on muscle milk for 15 yrs.. 33 year old looking better than my early 20’s. Put the work in (min 1hr, 5 days a week) and drink this within an hour of end of your workout and you’ll see gains no matter what. No bs.
customer_reviews.author: nick

customer_reviews.title: Mixes well with water
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using creatine on and off and what struck me differently about this was how finely ground it is. I used to know creatine as something that was hard to mix with water—heavy particles. This is like powdered sugar in its fineness. I will be getting this again. Really like it.
customer_reviews.author: James C

product_meta.title: MuscleTech Platinum Creatine Monohydrate Powder, 100% Pure Micronized Creatine Powder, 14.1oz (80 Servings)
product_meta.description: MuscleTech Platinum 100 percent Creatine provides your muscles with the world’s highest quality and most clinically researched form of micronized creatine powder. Creatine is shown to increase lean muscle and improve strength and endurance. *In one clinical study, subjects using the dose of creatine found in one max serving of MuscleTech Platinum 100 percent Creatine gained an amazing 6 lbs. of muscle in just 6 weeks.1 and in a separate study, test subjects increased their bench press strength by an impressive 18.6 percent in just 10 days! unlike other creatine formulas that provide a small, non studied dose of creatine HCl, MuscleTech Platinum 100 percent Creatine delivers a full 5 gram dose of HPLC tested creatine monohydrate that has been scientifically shown to build muscle and strength. REFERENCE: 1. Peeters et al. 1999. J. Strength and Cond. Res. 13(1):3 9. 2. Selsby et al 2004. J. Strength and Cond.
feature_bullets: Build More Muscle Size And Strength: Rest less between sets, get more power out of each set, get more reps from each set and, thus, stimulate more muscle fibers during each set
Combat Muscle Breakdown And Increase Growth: Research suggests your muscles with creatine, you can increase intracellular fluid, resulting in bigger, fuller muscles
No Fillers, No Added Sugars, 100 Percent Pure Creatine Powder: Each serving delivers 5 grams of premium HPLC tested micronized creatine monohydrate
Clinically studied results: Test subjects increased their bench press strength by an amazing 18.6 percentage in just 10 days

Safe, Effective & Approved By Virtually All Sports Associations: Since its introduction in the early 1990s, creatine has undergone more studies than any other supplement proving itself effective time and time again

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
